rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0010
rows.name: Disappeared?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0020
rows.name: What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0030
rows.name:
We got reports of an unexplained phenomenon—
dematerialization events, all across Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0040
rows.name: What do we know about it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0050
rows.name:
Whatever it is, it happened in several places
at the exact same moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0060
rows.name:
It created expanding spheres that swallow
anything they touch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0070
rows.name:
Any matter caught in the radius—gone without
a trace. Not even in the EM spectrum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0080
rows.name: Gone like cow piss in a rainstorm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0090
rows.name: That doesn't sound like a natural occurrence...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0100
rows.name:
For the time being, the effects are localized,
and the expansion has been limited...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0110
rows.name:
But if this keeps up, it's only a matter of time
until it reaches NLA as well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0120
rows.name: You're saying NLA is in danger?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0130
rows.name: That horrifying![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0140
rows.name: Tatsu prepare to evacuate at once![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0150
rows.name: And go where exactly?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0160
rows.name: This is happening everywhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0170
rows.name: Not like anywhere else is safer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0180
rows.name: If it swallows everything, then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0185
rows.name: no point putting up defenses, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0190
rows.name: It would be like spitting a hurricane in the eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0200
rows.name: First off, we'll need to gather concrete data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0210
rows.name: Let's find a place we can observe the phenomenon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0220
rows.name: Good plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0230
rows.name: Be extremely careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0240
rows.name: There's no way to predict what might happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0250
rows.name: Sure. Though in all honesty...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0260
rows.name:
That's been pretty much par for the course
since we set foot upon this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0270
rows.name: You said it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0280
rows.name: And this is precisely what we admire about humans![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0290
rows.name: This attitude of "all's well that ends with a bang"![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0300
rows.name: I'd rather avoid any more bangs...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0310
rows.name: Ah ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0320
rows.name:
The Lifehold Core investigation pales
in importance to this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0330
rows.name: Both are crucial matters, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0340
rows.name:
But even if analysis of the Lifehold determines
we're in no immediate danger...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0350
rows.name:
That won't mean much if all of Mira
dematerializes from under our feet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0360
rows.name:
Let's keep this under wraps.
Better that the troops stick to the investigation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0370
rows.name: Yes. Seems wise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0380
rows.name: No use causing widespread panic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0390
rows.name: Hm? Elma...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0400
rows.name: I've got a hunch, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0410
rows.name:
Everything that's going on...
It can't just be coincidence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0415
rows.name: I can't shake the feeling...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0420
rows.name: it's all connected.[ST:wait ]
